targets.query: SELECT last("id") AS "ID", "osType" AS "OS", "state" AS "State", "affinityScore" AS "Affinity Score" FROM "lpar_details" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/) AND ("lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lparname"

SELECT last("weight") AS "Weight", last("entitledProcUnits") AS "Entitled", last("currentVirtualProcessors") AS "VP", (last("utilizedProcUnits") / last("maxProcUnits")) * 100 AS "Utilization",  last("mode") AS "Mode" FROM "lpar_processor" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/) AND ("lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lparname" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "PartitionVirtualFiberChannelAdapters" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/ AND "name" != 'transmittedBytes' AND "partition" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "wwpn", "partition", "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Virtual Fiber Channel Adapters - Read Bytes

targets.query: SELECT mean("writeBytes") FROM "lpar_storage_vFC" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LparName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "lparname"

panels.title: Virtual Fiber Channel Adapters - Write Bytes

targets.query: SELECT mean("writeBytes") FROM "lpar_storage_virtual" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LparName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname"
SELECT mean("writeBytes") FROM "lpar_storage_virtual" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LparName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname"

SELECT (last("utilizedProcUnits") / last("maxProcUnits")) * 100 AS "usage" FROM "lpar_processor" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname", "servername" fill(null)

SELECT (last("utilizedProcUnits") / last("maxProcUnits")) * 100 AS "usage" FROM "lpar_processor" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname", "servername" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "server_processor" WITH KEY = "servername" WHERE time > now() - 24h
list.label: Server Name
list.name: ServerName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "server_processor" WITH KEY = "servername" WHERE time > now() - 24h

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lpar_processor" WITH KEY = "lparname" WHERE servername =~ /$ServerName/
list.label: Logical Partition
list.name: LPAR
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lpar_processor" WITH KEY = "lparname" WHERE servername =~ /$ServerName/
